Member Function Documentation

bool ServerComm::getTrSets ( QStringList &  trsets,
bool  popupOnError = true 
)

get list of the available trsets from the server

Parameters:
trsets receives the list
popupOnError determines whether an error generates a pop-up window
Returns:
true iff the operation succeeded
Do an HTTP GET of the directory on the server that has the available traceroute sets. The directory listing is parsed for links, and these are appended to the trsets vector.

QBuffer &  buf,
bool  popupOnError = true 
)

retrieve a file from the trsets directory on the server

Parameters:
filename is the true filename on the server
buf receives the file content
popupOnError determines whether an error generates a pop-up window
Returns:
true iff the operation succeeded
Fetch a trset batch file from the server.

bool ServerComm::submitTraceroute ( const char *  post_data,
TrStatus *  tstat,
bool  popupOnError = true 
)

submit traceroute data to the server

Parameters:
post_data is the string of data to be sent
tstat is the traceroute status object to be updated
popupOnError determines whether an error generates a pop-up window
Returns:
true iff the operation succeeded
Submit a traceroute formatted as HTTP POST data to the server.

void ServerComm::trResultsSubmitted ( bool  error  )  [private, slot]

slot receiving completion message for traceroute submission

Parameters:
error is set if there was an error submitting the traceroute to the server

bool  popupOnError 
) [private]

map QHttp error codes into IXmaps TrGen error codes

Parameters:

popupOnError allows pop-up critical error message box for server connection failures
Returns:
the IXmaps TrGen error code
